name: Mika
desc: Молодой рыцарь из обычной семьи, который служит передовым геодезистом отряда. Он застенчив и осторожен.

battle_talent.normal_desc1: До пяти атак с помощью арбалета и копья.
battle_talent.normal_desc2: Выпад, наносящий урон противникам на пути, на который тратится определённое количество выносливости.
battle_talent.normal_desc3: Стремительно падает на землю, атакуя всех врагов на пути. Приземлившись, наносит урон по площади.
battle_talent.element_desc:
Атакует противников из арбалета и наделяет всех персонажей из вашего отряда поблизости Ветром духа, который повышает их скорость атаки, когда они активны.
При долгом нажатии способ активации навыка меняется.

Быстрое нажатие
Выпускает пронзающую врагов стрелу потока инея, которая наносит Крио урон.

Долгое нажатие
Переходит в режим прицеливания и выпускает в зафиксированного в качестве цели врага Сигнал ледяной звезды, который наносит Крио урон. При попадании Сигнал ледяной звезды взлетает в воздух и разрывается Осколками ледяной звезды, которые поражают до 3 других противников и наносят Крио урон.

<i>Сияют звёзды на заиндевелом небе.
battle_talent.final_desc:
Derives the ability to spur his teammates on from the recited prayers of the knightly order, regenerating HP for all nearby party members. This healing is based on Mika’s Max HP and will grant them the Eagleplume state.

Eagleplume
When the Normal Attacks of active characters affected by Eagleplume hit an opponent, Mika will help them regenerate HP based on his Max HP.
Characters affected by this state can only regenerate HP in this way once per short interval of time.

Carry hope when in dire straits, and keep vigil when all is well… For that pure white plume shall at last guide the lost wayfarers.

basic_talent.talent1_desc:
Per the following circumstances, the Soulwind state caused by Starfrost Swirl will grant characters the Detector effect, increasing their Physical DMG by 10% when they are on the field.
·If the Flowfrost Arrow hits more than one opponent, each additional opponent hit will generate 1 Detector stack.
·When a Rimestar Shard hits an opponent, it will generate 1 Detector stack. Each Rimestar Shard can trigger the effect 1 time.

The Soulwind state can have a maximum of 3 Detector stacks, and if Starfrost Swirl is cast again during this duration, the pre-existing Soulwind state and all its Detector stacks will be cleared.
basic_talent.talent2_desc:
When an active character affected by both Skyfeather Song‘s Eagleplume and Starfrost Swirl‘s Soulwind at once scores a CRIT Hit with their attacks, Soulwind will grant them 1 stack of Detector from Suppressive Barrage. During a single instance of Soulwind, 1 Detector stack can be gained in this manner.
Additionally, the maximum number of stacks that can be gained through Soulwind alone is increased by 1.
Requires Suppressive Barrage to be unlocked first.
basic_talent.talent3_desc: Displays the location of nearby resources unique to Mondstadt on the mini-map.

sof.sof1_desc: The Soulwind state of Starfrost Swirl can decrease the healing interval between instances caused by Skyfeather Song‘s Eagleplume state. This decrease percentage is equal to the ATK SPD increase provided by Soulwind.
sof.sof2_desc: When Starfrost Swirl‘s Flowfrost Arrow first hits an opponent, or its Rimestar Flare hits opponents, 1 Detector stack from Passive Talent Suppressive Barrage will be generated.You must have unlocked the Passive Talent Suppressive Barrage first.
sof.sof3_desc:
Increases the Level of Skyfeather Song by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
sof.sof4_desc: When Mika’s own Skyfeather Song‘s Eagleplume state heals party members, this will restore 3 Energy to Mika. This form of Energy restoration can occur 5 times during the Eagleplume state created by 1 use of Skyfeather Song.
sof.sof5_desc:
Increases the Level of Starfrost Swirl by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
sof.sof6_desc:
The maximum number of Detector stacks that Starfrost Swirl‘s Soulwind can gain is increased by 1. You need to have unlocked the Passive Talent “Suppressive Barrage” first.
Additionally, active characters affected by Soulwind will deal 60% more Physical CRIT DMG.
